channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Little Lunch
channel.desc: The others try to cheer Rory up after he is punished and sent to the office.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: With a spike in oddness in the UK, Department of Help agent Ozzie suggests they send for help from the best agent in the world.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: Charlie uses Helsing?s time remote to bring a heavily muscled future version of himself back to the present to change his life.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: A walkie-talkie hidden inside a chili dog causes Harold to worry an alien has arrived.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Liko, Roy and Dot jump into action when the Explorers stage an attack on Naranja Academy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Stage Stars
channel.desc: With Christmas around the corner, the juniors give a festive performance at the local town fair. Meanwhile, it's time for Encore's end-of-term performance.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Malory Towers
channel.desc: Gwen is shocked into drastic action when her father refuses to sign her application to finishing school. Meanwhile, Darrell and Felicity fall out during the North Tower Spelling Bee.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. James and Riley struggle with their duet. Michelle demands an answer from Eldon - why is he avoiding her.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings end up lost after misplacing their jar of Yummy in a labyrinth.
